entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Leaf Rapids
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:08 AM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning this morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near noon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 13 February 2023
